Package infodynamics.measures.continuous

Interface Summary
ActiveInfoStorageCalculator  
ChannelCalculator An interface for calculators computing measures from a source to a destination for single variables in each (specific examples intended here are the mutual information and transfer entropy)
ChannelCalculatorCommon An abstract interface for calculators computing measures from a source to a destination.
ChannelCalculatorMultiVariate An interface for calculators computing measures from a source to a destination for multiple joint variables in each (specific examples intended here are the mutual information and transfer entropy).
ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate Interface for multivariate implementations of the conditional mutual information.
ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscrete A conditional mutual information calculator between a joint set of continuous variables, and a discrete variable, conditioned on another discrete variable.
ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSource A conditional mutual information calculator between a joint set of continuous variables, and a discrete variable, conditioned on another continuous variable vector.
EntropyCalculator  
EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate Interface for computing entropy for a multi-variate values (independent of underlying technique)
MultiInfoCalculator  
MultiInfoCalculatorWithMarginals Adds methods for computing average and local marginal entropies, joint entropy, and info distance.
MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate Interface for multivariate implementations of the mutual information.
MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscrete Interface defining computation of the differential mutual information between a given multivariate set of observations and a discrete variable.
MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithMarginals  
TransferEntropyCalculator This specifies the interface for implementations of the transfer entropy (see Schreiber, PRL, 2000) and local transfer entropy (see Lizier et al, PRE, 2008).
TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariate This specifies the interface for implementations of the transfer entropy (see Schreiber, PRL, 2000) and local transfer entropy (see Lizier et al, PRE, 2008).
 

Class Summary
ConditionalMutualInfoMultiVariateCommon Base class for implementations of ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate, e.g.
MutualInfoMultiVariateCommon Base class for implementations of MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate, e.g.
TransferEntropyCommon Base class for implementations of the transfer entropy (see Schreiber, PRL, 2000) and local transfer entropy (see Lizier et al, PRE, 2008).
